'''Damon Marbrand''' is the [[Lord of Ashemark]] and the head of [[House Marbrand]]. He is a bannerman of [[House Lannister]] and the father of Ser [[Addam Marbrand]].
sections.In the books: In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novel, little is mentioned of Lord Damon Marbrand. He is not present at his seat during the [[Sack of Ashemark|Battle of Ashemark]], with a [[castellan]] holding the castle instead.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
Due to Ser [[Amory Lorch]]'s nigh-illiteracy, a letter from [[Tywin Lannister]] to Lord Damon is accidentally sent to Lord [[Marlin Dormund|Marlin]] of [[House Dormund]], a vassal of [[House Stark]].
